attributes.additional_details:
I believe that we in Scotland should be given a choice, if we want to watch ITV/STV/UTV, instead of being restricted to our geographical location and missing out on content that's available only on ITV.com and not STV.TV or U.TV, I also want a choice on FreeView and the other digital TV recievers in Scotland to have ITV as a channel so we can decide what channel we watch.

I believe residents of Scotland deserve to watch the ITV Player as well as those in England, especially when we in Scotland (currently) can watch the UTV Player.

We have, ITV2, ITV3, ITV4 in Scotland, why not ITV and everything-else that goes with it?

rejection.details: For the broadcasting companies themselves, not the Government.
